item.title: Short Thoughts: keep your tests simple
item.description: Writing good tests, whether they are unit, acceptance, integration etc, is hard. Few tests will run quickly but probably won’t cover much of the code, however, having high coverage doesn’t mean your tests are good either. The way tests are written also depends on what the software and it’s structure is. Notwithstanding, there’s one aspect that I believe always helps, simplicity.
